Person B: Hey - hey man, you all right? Do you need to lie down or something?
Person B: All right. Well, just...let me know. I’ll be at my desk.

Person A: Hey - hey man, you all right?
Person A: Just got out of Juilliard. This is my first paying gig. First gig, really. Interesting experience.

Person A: Hey- hey man, you all right? Do you need to lie down or something?
Person A: All right, well, just...let me know...I’ll be at my desk. Hey, have you seen Sally anywhere?
